resources.string: BaHi is a platform where landlords and property managers can list their rental properties, and renters can search for their ideal home based on location, price, and preferences.
Click on the "Sign Up" button below "LOG IN" on the app landing page and follow the instructions to create an account.
Yes, creating an account and browsing listings is free. However, some premium features (e.g., promoted listings or advanced search filters) may require a subscription.
Use the search bar to enter your preferred location and apply filters such as price range, number of bedrooms, and property type to narrow your results.
Yes, you can contact the property owner or manager directly through the "Schedule Viewing" button on the property’s page.
The listing will show the current availability status. You can also message the property owner for confirmation.
We encourage property owners to provide accurate information and documentation.
Log in to your account, go to the "Listing" section, and fill in the required details about your property, including photos and descriptions.
Yes, you can edit your listing anytime through your account dashboard.
No, BaHi is merely a platform to post and look for accommodations. Payment methods depend on the property owner’s preferences.
Some properties may have additional charges for utilities, maintenance, or other services. Always check the listing details or confirm with the landlord.
Click on the "Recover Account" link on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password.
Visit our Help Center or contact our support team via BaHiHouseRental@gmail.com.
1. Always verify the property in person before making payments. \n2. Avoid sending money to landlords without a signed rental agreement. \n3. Report suspicious listings to our support team.
Yes, we take data privacy seriously and use encryption to protect your information. For details, see our Privacy Policy.
